attributes.action: Use his power to include the randoam use of Fireworks has "Disturbing the Peace"!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that this Goverment cannot accept that the Majority of the population do not want Fireworks exploding day after day & night after night! In this present day of Terrorism it seem ludicrous that the elderly (who most have gone through wars)and the rest of us have to endure constant explosions by the few which causes misery for the majority! Please sign this petition so that we can bring a small amount of sanity back!

rejection.details:
Difficult to understand main statement.

Plus pls see:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Saynotofireworks/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
